LanguageData.Brewing.label: alkoholin valmistus
LanguageData.Brewing.description: Mahdollistaa panimon tekemisen, joka muuttaa humalakasvit oikein maittavaksi olueksi.
LanguageData.CarpetMaking.label: matonteko
LanguageData.CarpetMaking.description: Mahdollistaa yhdyskuntalaisten rakentaa kokolattiamattoja parantaakseen heidän ympäristönsä laatua.
LanguageData.Cocoa.label: TODO
LanguageData.ComplexClothing.label: complex clothing
LanguageData.ComplexClothing.description: Sew complicated garments like pants, dusters, and cowboy hats.
LanguageData.ComplexFurniture.label: TODO
LanguageData.Devilstrand.label: devilstrand
LanguageData.Devilstrand.description: Allows colonists to plant devilstrand, a slow-growing mushroom that yields a valuable plant fiber.
LanguageData.DrugProduction.label: drug production
LanguageData.DrugProduction.description: The basics of drug preparation and synthesis. Allows creation of the drug lab. Further research is required to make specific drugs.
LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.label: go-juice production
LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.description: Learn to produce the synthetic combat-performance-enhancing drug go-juice.
LanguageData.Greatbow.label: TODO
LanguageData.LongBlades.label: TODO
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.label: passive cooler
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.description: Make passive coolers, a way to cool indoor spaces without using electricity.
LanguageData.Pemmican.label: pemmican
LanguageData.Pemmican.description: Make pemmican, a preserved mixture of meat and plant matter that doesn't go bad for a long time. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.label: penoxycyline production
LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.description: Learn to produce penoxycline, a disease prevention drug.
LanguageData.PlateArmor.label: TODO
LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.label: psychite refining
LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.description: Learn to refine psychoid leaves into flake and yayo, different forms of the euphoric drug psychite.
LanguageData.PsychoidBrewing.label: TODO
LanguageData.RecurveBow.label: TODO
LanguageData.Smithing.label: smithing
LanguageData.Smithing.description: Sepät tekevät aseita ja työkaluja raaoista materiaaleista.
LanguageData.Stonecutting.label: kivenleikkaus
LanguageData.Stonecutting.description: Rakenna kivenleikkauspöytiä, jotka mahdollistavat kivenlohkareista jalostamisen harkoiksi, joita voidaan käyttää rakentamiseen.
LanguageData.TreeSowing.label: TODO
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.label: wake-up production
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.description: Your chemists learn the formulas and techniques for synthesizing wake-up, a work performance-enhancing drug.
